name: A Donation of Wool
effect: Reward: Draw a card, then discard a card.
"Wonderful! We thank you for your generous donation!" — Clavicus Knavingham

name: Acolyte Demia
effect: “Whenever a warlock starts talking about sharing the wealth, I opt to be a pauper.” — Timmo Shadestep

name: Aimed Shot
effect: Your hero deals X ranged damage to target hero or ally.

name: Ancient Bone Bow
effect: Handed down from ancestor to ancestor, this bow has seen many enemies fall before it.

name: Anika Berlyn
effect: "Most paladins would gladly live and die as Uther did."

name: Arcane Intellect
effect: Ongoing: Attached hero's controller's maximum hand size is increased by three.

name: Arcane Shot
effect: A hunter's deadly accuracy doesn't just seem like magic; sometimes, it is.

name: Arcanite Reaper
effect: The arcanite reaper was long the mark of a true warrior in Azeroth. Having one crafted was like a rite of passage.

name: Are We There, Yeti?
effect: Reward: Put three Mechanical Yeti ally tokens with 1 ATK and 1 health into play.
"Now, I sent some mail to my friends already, telling them that I have a surprise for them. This is where you come in!" — Umi Rumplesnicker

name: Argent Crusader
effect: Trait Icons: Druid, Mage, Priest, Shaman, Warlock

name: Backstab
effect: In the war between the Horde and the Alliance, grudges are taken to the hilt.

name: Bala Silentblade
effect: Killing is her business, and business is good.

name: Barak the Shamed
effect: Those who fail the Test of Lore are outcast, bearing the Mark of Shame upon them.

name: Barov Peasant Caller
effect: Trait Icons: Druid, Hunter, Paladin, Rogue, Shaman, Warrior, Mage, Warlock, Priest
It calls forth three servants of House Barov to fight, cook, and clean for you.

name: Bash
effect: Ongoing: Your hero is in bear form. (Has protector. Destroy this card when you strike with a weapon or play a non-Feral ability.)

name: Battle of Darrowshire
effect: No man, woman, or child survived to tell the tale.

name: Battle Shout
effect: "For Lordaeron!" "For Khaz Modan!" "For the Horde!" Azeroth has heard them all.

name: Bear Form
effect: When Bear Form is destroyed, you may pay (2). If you do, put it into your hand at end of turn.

name: Benethor Draigo
effect: In life he cooked meat for his brothers. In death he cooked his brothers for meat.

name: Berserker Stance
effect: If your hero would be dealt damage, it is dealt that amount of damage plus 1 instead.

name: Bestial Wrath
effect: Target Pet has +3 ATK this turn. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to it this turn.

name: Big Game Hunter
effect: Reward: Reveal the top four cards of your deck. Put a revealed equipment card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
Killing for survival is savage. Killing for sport is civilized.

name: Bizzik Sparkcog
effect: "Wielding fel magic is like fixing a machine—you have to break a few things to get it to work."

name: Blessing of Might
effect: Ongoing: Attached character has +1 ATK while attacking.
Bestowed upon the worthy, increased might can facilitate great deeds.

name: Blessing of Protection
effect:
Ongoing: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to and dealt by attached character.

At end of turn, destroy Blessing of Protection.

Artist: Clint Langley

  • Card Number: 63
  • Rarity: Uncommon
  • Card Type: Ability
  • Play Cost: 2
At end of turn, destroy Blessing of Protection.

name: Blessing of Wisdom
effect: Ongoing: Attached character has "[Activate] ==> Draw a card."

name: Blink
effect: If your hero is defending, remove all attackers from combat.
"A well-timed blink can be the difference between a good story and a tearful eulogy."

name: Blood Guard Mal'wani
effect: "If'n I taste my own blood, I know I'm doin' somethin' right."

name: Bloodclaw
effect: The eyes of a raptor reveal a feral, vicious intelligence at work.

name: Blueleaf Tubers
effect: Reward: Shuffle your graveyard into your deck.
"Those tubers are impossible to find unless you know just where to look. That's why I've trained these snufflenose gophers to find them for me."

name: Boris Brightbeard
effect: "I'd lay off the short jokes if ye want me to keep ye alive, laddie."

name: Brain Freeze
effect: "You know that feeling you get when you suck down too much Tigule and Foror's ice cream at once? Kind of like that."

name: Brain Hacker
effect: Destroy your enemy's mind, and his body will soon follow.

name: Call the Spirit
effect: “As our ancestors watch over us in our passing, so too will they aid in our return from the spirit realm.” — Grennan Stormspeaker

name: Chain Lightning
effect: The air crackled with electricity as the bolt leapt from body to body, leaving the scent of charred flesh in its wake.

name: Charge
effect: A charge is one of those things that always ends badly for someone.

name: Chasing A-Me 01
effect: Reward: Put target ally card from your graveyard into your hand.

name: Chastise
effect: "You have been judged unworthy. May the Light have pity upon your blackened soul." — Boris Brightbeard

name: Chromatic Cloak
effect: Trait Icons: Druid, Mage, Paladin, Priest, Shaman, Warlock
The cloak shimmers with power. Its fabric feels electric to the touch.

name: Chromie
effect: “You could say that we have met before. To that end, we shall also meet again.”

name: Circle of Life
effect: "If one of us should fall in battle, our brothers and sisters shall rally tenfold!" — Moonshadow

name: Cleanse
effect: Foul magics, poisons, and diseases all fall before the cleansing Light.

name: Cold Blood
effect:
Draw a card.

When your hero deals damage to an ally this turn, destroy that ally.

Artist: Ariel Olivetti

  • Card Number: 92
  • Rarity: Rare
  • Card Type: Ability
  • Play Cost: 1
When your hero deals damage to an ally this turn, destroy that ally.

name: Cold Snap
effect:
Remove Cold Snap from the game.

Put up to X Frost ability cards with different names from your graveyard into your hand.

Artist: Jason Engle

  • Card Number: 50
  • Rarity: Rare
  • Card Type: Ability
  • Play Cost: 2+X
Put up to X Frost ability cards with different names from your graveyard into your hand.

name: Confessor Mildred
effect: "Confess your sins so that I may strip them from your flesh."

name: Corruption
effect:
Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 shadow damage to attached character.

When attached character is destroyed, its controller discards a card.

Artist: Clint Langley

  • Card Number: 120
  • Rarity: Uncommon
  • Card Type: Ability
  • Play Cost: 2
When attached character is destroyed, its controller discards a card.

name: Counterattack!
effect: "Face the Kolkar invaders, and end their threat in the Barrens. Kill them until their leader, Warlord Krom'zar, appears. Defeat him and bring me a piece of his banner as proof." — Regthar Deathgate

name: Coup de Grâce
effect: "Let there never be rest for the weary." — The Assassin's Creed, Chapter 4

name: Crazy Igvand
effect: "Ye won't be getting past me, laddy!"

name: Crippling Poison
effect: Ongoing: At the start of each turn, exhaust attached character unless its controller pays (3).

name: Curse of Agony
effect: Ongoing: At the start of your turn, put an agony counter on Curse of Agony, then your hero deals 1 shadow damage to attached character for each agony counter on Curse of Agony.

name: Dark Pact
effect:
As an additional cost to play Dark Pact, destroy one of your Pets.

Draw X cards, where X is the cost of the Pet you destroyed.

Artist: Jeremy McHugh

  • Card Number: 122
  • Rarity: Rare
  • Card Type: Ability
  • Play Cost: 2
Draw X cards, where X is the cost of the Pet you destroyed.

name: Deadly Poison
effect: Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 2 nature damage to attached character.

name: Deathdealer Breastplate
effect: The business of death is like any other, and in Azeroth, demand is always high.

name: Defensive Stance
effect:
If your hero would deal damage, prevent 1 of that damage.

If your hero would be dealt damage, prevent 1 of that damage.

Artist: Dave Kendall

  • Card Number: 139
  • Rarity: Rare
  • Card Type: Ability
  • Play Cost: 3
If your hero would be dealt damage, prevent 1 of that damage.

name: Demoralizing Shout
effect: The orc's mighty bellow could unnerve even the bravest of foes.

name: Destiny
effect: Destiny has +1 ATK for each strength counter on it.
Engraved on the hilt are the words, "Fate and fortune guide you."

name: Devilsaur Leggings
effect: Those seeking devilsaur leather often become devilsaur meals.

name: Devotion Aura
effect: "By safeguarding those around him, a paladin aids in his own defense." — Uther the Lightbringer

name: Dismantle
effect: "With one well-timed strike, any opponent can be stripped of his defenses." —The Assassin's Creed, Chapter 2

name: Dispel Magic
effect: A fool and her blessings are soon parted.

name: Divine Shield
effect:
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to your hero this turn.

Your hero can't be targeted by opponents this turn.

Artist: Matt Dixon

  • Card Number: 67
  • Rarity: Rare
  • Card Type: Ability
  • Play Cost: 3
Your hero can't be targeted by opponents this turn.

name: Dizdemona
effect: Who would believe fel magic could hide behind such a face?

name: Donna Calister
effect: When an opposing hero or ally attacks, ready Donna Calister.

name: Dorric the Martyr
effect: Although the act of sacrifice is not exclusive to the Knights of the Silver Hand, they consider it to be a staple of their creed.

name: Dragonkin Menace
effect: Reward: Ready a hero or ally in your party.
"""Succeed, and perhaps we can talk of other things."" — Helendis Riverhorn"

name: Dwarven Hand Cannon
effect: (2) ==> Dwarven Hand Cannon has +1 ATK this turn.
It isn't accurate because it doesn't need to be.

name: Earthbind Totem
effect: Ongoing: Opposing allies can't ready during their controllers' ready step.
"Amusing, that those who do not embrace the land will be themselves embraced by it."

name: Edgemaster's Handguards
effect: "These invaluable handguards steady even the most unskilled of hands."

name: Elder Moorf
effect: "May the eternal sun shine upon thee."

name: Elemental Focus
effect: Ongoing: You pay (1) less to play Elemental abilities, to a minimum of (1).

name: Elendril
effect: Elendril is most at home in the wilderness with only his tiger at his side.

name: Entangling Roots
effect: Ongoing: Attached ally can't ready during its controller's ready step.
The vines grew angry, as if every weed of Azeroth sought revenge upon those who would destroy their fertile home.

name: Eviscerate
effect: Your hero deals X melee damage to target hero or ally, where X is 2 plus the number of Combo cards removed.
"Guts were meant to be gutted." — The Assassin's Creed, Chapter 3

name: Execute
effect: Showing weakness to a warrior is a death sentence.

name: Expose Armor
effect: Destroy X target armor, where X is the number of Combo cards removed.

name: Eye of Flame
effect: Focus the Eye, and so too the flame.

name: Eye of Rend
effect: The Eye is said to reveal even the most obscured weaknesses of a foe.

name: Fa'tafi
effect: At the start of each turn, Fa'tafi heals 1 damage from herself.

name: Face Smash
effect: For all their talk of honor and the Light, even the Alliance has a savage side.

name: Fang of the Crystal Spider
effect: The jeweled blade hides a debilitating secret.

name: Fear
effect: It fled without a word . . . unless "AAAAAGH!" counts as a word.

name: Fianna Spellbinder
effect: She craves the unnatural power of magic.

name: Fireball
effect: Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 fire damage to attached character.

name: Flame Wrath
effect: In the right hands, this weapon can stop armies.

name: Flamestrike
effect: "What's betta den fire? More fire, mon!" — Ta'zo

name: For the Horde!
effect: Reward: Horde allies in your party have +1 ATK while attacking this turn.
"Be bathed in my power! Drink in my might! Battle for the glory of the Horde!" — Warchief Thrall

name: Forbidden Knowledge
effect: Ongoing: If you would draw a card, choose a card you removed and put it into your hand instead.
"What is the point of possessing power if it is not used?"

name: From the Shadows
effect: Fear those that move in the shadows.

name: Frost Nova
effect: Litori's pursuers found themselves quite literally frozen in their tracks.

name: Frost Shock
effect: There is only one kind of cold the dwarves of Dun Morogh fear.

name: Frostbolt
effect: “Wearing heavy plate is taxing enough without having to lug around another eighty pounds of ice.” — Warrax

name: Fury
effect: A faint rustling of brush, a whirlwind of tooth and claw—and silence. Such is the fate of Fury's prey.

name: Gellrin of the Gallows
effect: "Even in death, I'll leave a scar upon you."

name: Gift of the Elven Magi
effect: Trait Icons: Druid, Mage, Priest, Shaman, Warlock

name: Girdle of Uther
effect: "By Uther's beard, do not give up. There is still a battle to be fought."

name: Golem Skull Helm
effect: A trophy from the golem Panzer, bouncer for the Grim Guzzler.

name: Gouge
effect: "Every being has vulnerable spots; make it your business to know them all." — The Assassin's Creed, Chapter 2

name: Graccus
effect: The greatest battles are won not by strength of arm, but strength of will.

name: Green Whelp Armor
effect: Famously used by the druid Snig in battles for Warsong Gulch.

name: Grennan Stormspeaker
effect: The sky itself trembles at his call.

name: Grimdron
effect: (1), [Activate] ==> Grimdron deals 1 fire damage to target hero or ally.
"You better back me up on this one!"

name: Guardian Steelhorn
effect: Every tauren vows to keep safe the golden plains of Mulgore.

name: Hammer of Justice
effect: Justice in Azeroth is in short supply, but merciless when it does arrive.

name: Hand of Edward the Odd
effect: A brutal reminder that power should remain with the empowered.

name: Hannah the Unstoppable
effect: "You'll eventually gather your wits, but nothing will save your gold."

name: Headmaster's Charge
effect: Trait Icons: Druid, Mage, Priest, Shaman, Warlock

name: Heal
effect: One simple touch can mend so much.

name: Healing Stream Totem
effect: Ongoing: At the start of each turn, Healing Stream Totem heals 1 damage from each hero and ally in your party.

name: Healing Touch
effect: The druids’ reverence for nature allows them to bestow wondrous gifts upon their allies.

name: Hearthstone
effect: Trait Icons: Druid, Hunter, Paladin, Rogue, Shaman, Warrior, Mage, Warlock, Priest

name: Helm of Fire
effect: Trait Icons: Hunter, Paladin, Shaman, Warrior, Druid, Rogue

name: Helwen
effect: [Activate] ==> While Helwen remains exhausted, you control target ally.

name: Herod's Shoulder
effect: The heroes of Azeroth carry more than the weight of armor on their shoulders.

name: Heroic Strike
effect: A warrior's blade finds its mark as much by will as by skill.

name: Hierophant Caydiem
effect: "May your ancestors forever guard your path."

name: Holy Light
effect: "The third and most important of the Light's virtues is compassion." — Uther the Lightbringer

name: Holy Shield
effect: Prevent the next 5 damage that would be dealt to your hero by target hero or ally this turn. When damage is prevented this way, your hero deals that amount of holy damage to that character.

name: Horns of Eranikus
effect: Eranikus lies trapped in the Emerald Dream amidst chaos and nightmare.

name: Hypnotic Blade
effect: Trait Icons: Druid, Mage, Priest, Shaman, Warlock
The thrusts and slashes of her blade were mesmerizing, making defense a challenge.

name: Illusionary Rod
effect: Trait Icons: Druid, Mage, Priest, Shaman, Warlock

name: In Dreams
effect: "I want not to dream anymore." — Taelan Fordring

name: Infernal
effect: At the end of your turn, Infernal deals 1 fire damage to each opposing hero and ally.
The master of every infernal worries not about its death, but that it might survive too long.

name: Innervate
effect: Energy surged through her body like a raging river.

name: Interest You in a Pint?
effect: "I don't have a drinking problem. I drink; I get drunk; I fall down—no problem!"

name: Into the Maw of Madness
effect: "I need you to venture into Hive'Regal and find what became of my dearest Natalia." — Commander Mar'alith

name: Invulnerable Mail
effect: It is imbued by a magical forge with the power to turn aside any physical blow.

name: It's a Secret to Everybody
effect: Reward: Look at the top three cards of your deck. Put one on the top of your deck and the rest on the bottom.
Some secrets are best hidden in plain sight.

name: Ka'tali Stonetusk
effect: At the start of your turn, Ka'tali Stonetusk heals 1 damage from himself.

name: Kailis Truearc
effect: "One elf, fun. Five elf, run." — Orc children's rhyme

name: Kayleitha
effect: For some, darkness is a source of fear. For others, darkness is all they know.

name: Kena Shadowbrand
effect: Warlocks have the ability to convert their own life force into rewards—both material and evanescent.

name: Kibler's Exotic Pets
effect: Reward: Reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put a revealed ally card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

name: Kor Cindervein
effect: "By my beard, those who forge their own blessings need never beg for them."

name: Krol Blade
effect: This blade's keen edge always fetches a high price at the auction house.

name: Kulan Earthguard
effect: At the end of your turn, ready Kulan Earthguard.

name: Lady Courtney Noel
effect: "If I cannot save Azeroth, I will keep safe those who can."

name: Lafiel
effect: Even the grace of Elune cannot keep all her daughters from the shadow.

name: Landro Longshot
effect: There are rumors—some sinister, some benign—that Landro's influence extends far beyond the arena of gambling.

name: Last Stand
effect:
Ongoing: Your hero has +20 health.

At the start of your turn, discard two cards or destroy Last Stand.

Artist: Michael Komarck

Though battered and bloody, Warrax simply refused to fall.

  • Rarity: Rare
  • Card Type: Ability
  • Play Cost: 1
At the start of your turn, discard two cards or destroy Last Stand.
Though battered and bloody, Warrax simply refused to fall.

name: Latro Abiectus
effect: "I am morally certain you have made a critical error in judgment, orc."

name: Leeroy Jenkins
effect: Say "Leeeerooooy Jenkins!" ==> Leeroy has ferocity this turn.

name: Lei of Lilies
effect: Trait Icons: Druid, Mage, Priest, Paladin, Shaman, Warlock
(1), Destroy Lei of Lilies ==> Your hero heals 1 damage from itself for each card in your hand.
This garland is reputed to possess extraordinary magical powers.

name: Lhurg Venomblade
effect: “Let me give you something to help you rest better, lad.”

name: Life Tap
effect: When the dark arts call for flesh, you can only trust your own.

name: Lightning Bolt
effect: Shamans know that lightning can strike twice in the same place.

name: Lionheart Helm
effect: The helm grants the ability to strike blows as pure and true as a rich thorium vein.

name: Litori Frostburn
effect: Her touch is as cold as her heart.

name: Lord Grayson Shadowbreaker
effect: When Lord Grayson Shadowbreaker becomes exhausted, he heals 2 damage from target hero or ally.
On his tombstone will be engraved three words: respect, tenacity, and compassion.

name: Lt. Commander Dudefella
effect: "It's rare that I don't spend a night killing Horde. They're filthy animals."

name: Mana Agate
effect: Magi are unique in their ability to store mana for future use without alchemical aid.

name: Mark of the Wild
effect: Ongoing: Attached ally has +2 ATK and +2 health.
"May Cenarius smile upon you." — Archdruid Hamuul Runetotem

name: Marked for Death
effect: Ongoing: Allies in your party have +1 ATK while attacking attached character.
Once marked, there can be no escape.

name: Masons Fraternity Ring
effect: Trait Icons: Druid, Hunter, Rogue, Paladin, Shaman, Warrior

name: Master of the Hunt
effect: A well-trained pet is a powerful extension of the hunter’s body. Like its master, it's frightening to behold in combat.

name: Maul
effect: Ongoing: Your hero is in bear form. (Has protector. Destroy this card when you strike with a weapon or play a non-Feral ability.)

name: Medoc Spiritwarden
effect: "We pray for the strength to fight once more, for our brothers and for our home."

name: Melgwy Pingzot
effect: You can easily tell who the smartest gnomes are. They're the ones who still have their eyebrows.

name: Mind Blast
effect: “Shadow priests, mon . . . dey can melt faces.” — Ta’zo

name: Mind Control
effect:
Ongoing: You control attached ally.

When you play a card, destroy Mind Control.

name: Mind Spike
effect: Victims of a shadow priest seldom remember why they’re victims.

name: Mocking Blow
effect: Pride, more than flesh, is easily stung.

name: Moko Hunts-at-Dawn
effect: The early hunter catches the bird catching the worm.

name: Mooncloth Robe
effect: Tailors tell that the first recipe for mooncloth was scribed by Elune herself.

name: Moonshadow
effect: Life, death, rebirth: all of nature is a cycle.

name: Mortal Strike
effect: Your hero deals X melee damage to target hero or ally, where X is 1 plus the ATK of one of your Melee weapons. That character can't be healed this turn.

name: Myrmidon's Signet
effect: Trait Icons: Druid, Paladin, Rogue, Shaman, Warrior
Highly prized by warriors across Azeroth, the signet's price was well worth the bloodshed it saved.

name: Natural Defenses
effect: Thangal weathered blow after blow unscathed, blade and arrow alike glancing harmlessly off his thick hide.

name: Nature's Swiftness
effect: You pay (5) less to play your next card this turn.
An age of growth in a fleeting moment—such is the unbridled power of nature.

name: Nerra Lifeboon
effect: There is shelter to be found even outside the branches of Teldrassil.

name: Nightbloom
effect: Those who remember the vitalizing touch of the World Tree feel bound to duplicate it.

name: Noggenfogger Elixir
effect: Trait Icons: Druid, Hunter, Paladin, Rogue, Shaman, Warrior, Mage, Warlock, Priest

name: Omedus the Punisher
effect: In life, Omedus was a handsome scholar. The plague was not kind to him.

name: On Your Feet
effect: Ready target ally in your party. It has protector this turn.

name: Ophelia Barrows
effect: (1) ==> Remove target ally card in any graveyard from the game. If you do, Ophelia Barrows heals 1 damage from herself.

name: Parvink
effect: When Parvink enters play, draw a card.
Tauren warriors stand between their allies and death. Gnomes keep death from walking that far.

name: Piccolo of the Flaming Fire
effect: Trait Icons: Druid, Hunter, Paladin, Rogue, Shaman, Warrior, Mage, Warlock, Priest

name: Polymorph
effect: Attached ally can't attack or protect, loses all powers, and is a Sheep.

name: Power Word: Fortitude
effect: Spoken aloud, this word turns flesh to iron, doubt to courage.

name: Predatory Strikes
effect: Ongoing: While your hero is in bear form or cat form, it has +2 ATK while attacking.

name: Premeditation
effect: Search your deck for up to two Combo cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand.
"Leave nothing to chance." — The Assassin's Creed, Chapter 1

name: Primal Mending
effect: Ongoing: At the end of each turn, your hero heals 1 damage from attached ally.
As with the land, the scars of battle take time to heal.

name: Purge
effect: It is as with Mannoroth's blood curse—a spiritual problem requires a spiritual solution.

name: Pyroblast
effect:
Attach to target hero or ally, and your hero deals 6 fire damage to it.

name: Radak Doombringer
effect: Azeroth's darkest places offer great rewards to those willing to traverse them.

name: Rain of Fire
effect: At the end of your turn, your hero deals 1 fire damage to each opposing hero and ally.
This is the rain that falls in the Twisted Nether.

name: Randipan
effect: "The fastest way to an orc's heart is between the third and fourth ribs."

name: Rend
effect: Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 melee damage to attached character.
"I gave him a choice: die piece by piece, or all at once." — Gorebelly

name: Resurrection
effect: May your second chance end better than your first.

name: Rise to the Challenge
effect:
Draw cards until you reach your maximum hand size.

name: Rod of the Ogre Magi
effect: Trait Icons: Druid, Mage, Priest, Shaman, Warlock
A weapon found in Dire Maul, the rod bestows great power upon the wielder.

name: Ryn Dreamstrider
effect: [Activate] ==> Target hero or ally has +2 ATK while attacking this turn.
Every wood has a path that only the wood dweller knows.

name: Sacred Duty
effect: When your hero protects, it heals 1 damage from itself.

name: Saltwater Snapjaw
effect: Many sought a mount that would bring its own armor to war. Landro delivered.

name: Samuel Grey
effect: In life, he was quick and cruel. In death, why change?

name: Sarmoth
effect: Voidwalkers do not fear pain, so they are popular with warlocks who do.

name: Scarlet Kris
effect: Its secret is that the blood of its victims keeps the scarlet color bright.

name: Seal of Light
effect: (1), Destroy Seal of Light ==> Your hero heals 4 damage from itself.
It was said that every enemy Uther felled strengthened his resolve.

name: Seal of Wisdom
effect: (1), Destroy Seal of Wisdom ==> Draw a card.
"Such a seal sharpens the mind for the moment of revelation to come."

name: Searing Totem
effect: Ongoing: At the start of each turn, Searing Totem deals 1 fire damage to target hero or ally.
"The wood whispered to me as I conjured it. It said it did not fear flame." — Grennan Stormspeaker

name: Sen'zir Beastwalker
effect: Vicious and cunning; like hunter, like pet.

name: Sentry Gwynn
effect: "I know whom you seek, but you'll have to deal with me first."

name: Seva Shadowdancer
effect: (X), [Activate] ==> Seva Shadowdancer heals X damage from target hero or ally.

name: Shadow Bolt
effect: "May darkness take you, for when I'm done, the Light will not recognize you."— Radak Doombringer

name: Shadow Word: Pain
effect: Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 shadow damage to attached character.
"Your pain is my pleasure." — Omedus the Punisher

name: Shadowform
effect:
Ongoing: If your hero would deal shadow damage, it deals that amount of damage plus 1 instead.

When you play a Holy ability, destroy Shadowform.

Artist: Alex Horley

"I draw deep into the shadows to slake my thirst for power. I'm never thirsty for long."

  • Card Number: 88
  • Rarity: Rare
  • Card Type: Ability
  • Play Cost: 3
When you play a Holy ability, destroy Shadowform.
"I draw deep into the shadows to slake my thirst for power. I'm never thirsty for long."

name: Shattering Blow
effect: "The three most important aspects of weaponry are repair, repair, and repair."

name: Shield Bash
effect: Your hero deals 1 damage to target hero or ally. If you targeted a hero, you may interrupt an ability card played by its controller.

name: Skewer
effect: Despite the years they spent in the internment camps of Lordaeron, the Horde never truly lost their will to fight.

name: Skorn, Mistress of Shadow
effect: The greatest warlocks of Azeroth have one thing in common: a lust for strength not their own.

name: Sneak
effect: You can't kill what you can't find.

name: Soul Link
effect: Ongoing: Put 1 damage on an ally in your party ==> Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to your hero this turn.

name: Spirit Healer
effect: “It is not yet your time. I shall aid your journey back to the realm of the living.”

name: Spiritual Healing
effect: Ongoing: When you play a Holy ability, your hero heals 2 damage from target hero or ally.

name: Stalwart Protector
effect: Nothing inspires greatness more than standing alone between victory and defeat.

name: Starfire
effect: The very heavens echoed the druid's rage and opened up at his command.

name: Steal Essence
effect: "Tonight, I'll drink to your health—may it long be mine."

name: Stealth
effect: When Stealth is destroyed, you may pay (2). If you do, put it into your hand at end of turn.

name: Stronghold Gauntlets
effect: Hold onto your weapon as you would your own life.

name: Stylean Silversteel
effect: "Leading a raid can be like herding cats, but by the graces they're YOUR cats."

name: Sudden Reversal
effect: A cornered foe fights twice as fiercely.

name: Sunken Treasure
effect: Reward: Put target equipment card from your graveyard into your hand.
"Can I trust you to deliver this message safely and in confidence?" — Fleet Master Seahorn

name: Ta'zo
effect: "You play wit da fire, mon, you gonna get da burn!"

name: Thangal
effect: The most powerful druids know their greatest strength lies in versatility.

name: The Cruel Hand of Timmy
effect: The hand's cruelty is a reflection of the cruelty Timmy had endured in his short life.

name: The Defias Brotherhood
effect: "There is but one task left for you to complete. Edwin VanCleef must be assassinated." — Gryan Stoutmantle

name: The Love Potion
effect: "Oh, the pains of love!" — Mistress Nagmara

name: The Missing Diplomat
effect: Reward: Search your deck for an ally card, reveal it, and put it into your hand.
"""Bishop DeLavey asked me to approach adventurers who might be able to help him with a delicate matter."" — Thomas"

name: The Princess Trapped
effect: Reward: Reveal the top two cards of your deck. Target opponent chooses one. Put that card into your hand and the other one on the bottom of your deck.

name: Thunderhead Hippogryph
effect: The Black Flame were among the first to gain the aid of the mighty hippogryphs in battle.

name: Timmo Shadestep
effect: The ability to hide in half a shadow makes gnomes among Azeroth's deadliest assassins.

name: Tooga's Quest
effect: Reward: Put a unique Turtle ally token named Tooga with 1 ATK and 1 health into play. At the start of your next turn, remove Tooga from the game. If you do, draw two cards.
"So he couldn't find his way back on his own? Figures." —Torta

name: Torek's Assault
effect: "What do you say? Are you with us?" — Torek

name: Totemic Call
effect:
Air: Ready your hero and one of your Melee weapons.

Earth: Allies in your party have +1 ATK this turn.

Fire: Your hero deals 2 fire damage to target hero or ally.

Water: Draw two cards."

Artist: Peter Lee

“Storm, earth, and fire, heed my call!"

  • Card Number: 117
  • Rarity: Rare
  • Card Type: Ability
  • Play Cost: 4

Earth: Allies in your party have +1 ATK this turn.

Fire: Your hero deals 2 fire damage to target hero or ally.

Water: Draw two cards."

Artist: Peter Lee

“Storm, earth, and fire, heed my call!"

“Storm, earth, and fire, heed my call!"

name: Touched by Light
effect: A simple touch of holy Light to mend the wounds of a battered knight.

name: Tracker Gallen
effect: Tauren are none too fond of the cry "Bull's-eye!"

name: Truesilver Champion
effect: The bright blade sings a chorus of honor and triumph.

name: Twig of the World Tree
effect: Great power pulses and hums beneath the bark of such a simple branch.

name: Valthak Spiritdrinker
effect: “You shall face me in the end. Fools always do.”

name: Veil of Night
effect: Ongoing: Your hero is stealthed. (Can't protect against it. Destroy this card when your hero deals damage.)

name: Wall of the Dead
effect: Wall of the Dead has +1 DEF for each bone counter on it.

name: Warchief Thrall
effect: "Lok'Tar, friend. Have you come to serve the Horde?"

name: Warlord Goretooth
effect: "Succeed and be honored. Fail and be forgotten."

name: Warrax
effect: "So long as I stand, you shall not pass."

name: Waylay
effect: Not especially glamorous, true; but it gets the job done.

name: Wilba
effect: (3) ==> Put a unique Spider ally token named Charlotte with 1 ATK and 1 health into play.
"Oh, she doesn't really eat them. She just drinks their blood. She loves blood."

name: Windfury Totem
effect: Ongoing: When each hero or ally in your party attacks for the first time each turn, you may pay (1). If you do, ready that character.

name: Windfury Weapon
effect: Ongoing: When you strike with attached weapon for the first time each turn, you may pay (1). If you do, ready that weapon and your hero.

name: Withdraw
effect: “These new battle plans will surely snatch defeat from the jaws of victory.”

name: World in Flames
effect: The trail of the Burning Legion scorched Azeroth, leaving nothing but cinder and ash in the Legion's wake.

name: Wormwood
effect: “You’re lucky; instilling terror is the kindest thing on my agenda.”

name: Wyneth Harridan
effect: "As the Light shines, so shall we."

name: Ya'mon
effect: "You wouldn't like me when I'm angry, mon."

name: Zapped Giants
effect: Reward: Reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put a revealed ability card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
"""I'm going to have to do something about the giants if I stay out here!"" — Zorbin Fandazzle"

name: Zy'lah Manslayer
effect: When Zy'lah Manslayer deals combat damage to an ally, ready her.
